name: CDash
description:
CDash is a CD-themed rhythm game where you move a player across a 24 by 14 tile gameplay area while it's constantly changing, attempting to avoid the broken tiles. 

It was initially made for a school project in 2 weeks so it is neither polished nor balanced, so play with that in mind. Let me know what you think!

The game was also not originally made to run in fullscreen so it looks a lot worse with processing's resize, if you can find a way, resize it to 1600x900 for the best visual experience.

None of the music in the game is mine, the artists are mentioned on the level select screen though.
